description.zh-cn: 壮族，中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级党和国家领导人。曾任广西壮族自治区人民政府主席、全国人大常委会副委员长。2000年因受贿罪被判处并执行死刑。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Zhuang ethnicity, and a former deputy national-level party and state leader. He served as the Chairman of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. In 2000, he was sentenced to death and executed for bribery.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。成克杰曾担任其副委员长。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China. Cheng Kejie once served as its Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在成克杰担任全国人大常委会副委员长期间任委员长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress while Cheng Kejie was the Vice Chairman.

nodes.id: 广西壮族自治区人民政府

zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区人民政府
en: People's Government of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广西壮族自治区的省级行政机关。成克杰曾担任其主席。
description.en: The provincial-level administrative organ of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region in the People's Republic of China. Cheng Kejie once served as its Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在成克杰担任广西壮族自治区主席期间曾任自治区党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Party Secretary of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region while Cheng Kejie was the Chairman of the region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在成克杰担任广西壮族自治区主席期间曾任自治区党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Party Secretary of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region while Cheng Kejie was the Chairman of the region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在成克杰担任广西壮族自治区主席期间曾任自治区党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Party Secretary of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region while Cheng Kejie was the Chairman of the region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，成克杰的前任广西壮族自治区主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the predecessor of Cheng Kejie as the Chairman of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，成克杰的继任广西壮族自治区主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the successor of Cheng Kejie as the Chairman of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广西壮族自治区
location.en: Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 成克杰的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Cheng Kejie.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都。成克杰在此地被执行死刑。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China. Cheng Kejie was executed here.

description.zh-cn: 成克杰的情妇，伙同成克杰收受贿赂。
description.en: The mistress of Cheng Kejie, who colluded with him in accepting bribes.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。成克杰曾是其党员，后被开除党籍。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China. Cheng Kejie was once a member but was later expelled.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的教育部直属全国重点大学，成克杰的母校。
description.en: A national key university under the direct administration of the Ministry of Education located in Beijing, China, and the alma mater of Cheng Kejie.

description.zh-cn: 中国国家铁路集团有限公司管理的18个铁路局集团公司之一。成克杰曾在此长期工作并担任局长。
description.en: One of the 18 railway bureau group companies managed by China State Railway Group. Cheng Kejie worked here for a long time and served as its director.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会
en: Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广西壮族自治区的领导机关。成克杰曾担任其副书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region. Cheng Kejie once served as its Deputy Secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会
en: 14th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1992年至1997年间的最高领导机构。成克杰是其委员之一。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 1992 to 1997. Cheng Kejie was one of its members.

nodes.id: 第九届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第九届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1998年至2003年间的最高国家权力机关。该届人大第一次会议选举成克杰为全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: The highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China from 1998 to 2003. Its first session elected Cheng Kejie as Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治体系中，对担任主要领导职务者的统称。成克杰曾位列其中。
description.en: A collective term in the political system of the People's Republic of China for those holding major leadership positions. Cheng Kejie was once among them.

description.zh-cn: 原玉林地委书记，其在羁押期间的检举揭发导致了对成克杰的调查。
description.en: Former Party Secretary of Yulin Prefecture, whose report during detention led to the investigation of Cheng Kejie.

nodes.id: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高纪律检查机关，负责对成克杰的腐败问题进行调查。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China, which was responsible for investigating Cheng Kejie's corruption case.

nodes.id: 广西壮族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区人民代表大会的常设机关，罢免了成克杰的全国人大代表职务。
description.en: The permanent body of the People's Congress of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, which removed Cheng Kejie from his position as a deputy to the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院
en: Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高法律监督机关，决定依法逮捕成克杰。
description.en: The highest legal supervision organ of the People's Republic of China, which decided to arrest Cheng Kejie according to law.

nodes.id: 北京市第一中级人民法院

zh-cn: 北京市第一中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市的中级人民法院之一，一审判处成克杰死刑。
description.en: One of the intermediate people's courts in Beijing, People's Republic of China, which sentenced Cheng Kejie to death in the first instance.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高审判机关，裁定核准成克杰死刑。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China, which approved the death sentence for Cheng Kejie.

description.zh-cn: 成克杰于1984年2月加入中国共产党，2000年4月20日被开除党籍。
description.en: Cheng Kejie joined the Communist Party of China in February 1984 and was expelled on April 20, 2000.

description.zh-cn: 因收受巨额贿赂、非法谋利，成克杰被开除中国共产党党籍。
description.en: Cheng Kejie was expelled from the Communist Party of China for accepting huge bribes and illegal profiteering.

position.zh-cn: 技术员、工程师、总工程师、副局长、局长
position.en: Technician, Engineer, Chief Engineer, Deputy Director, Director

description.zh-cn: 成克杰自1957年起在柳州铁路局（中国铁路南宁局集团前身）工作，历任多个职位，直至1986年升任广西壮族自治区副主席。
description.en: Starting in 1957, Cheng Kejie worked at the Liuzhou Railway Bureau (predecessor of China Railway Nanning Group), holding various positions until he was promoted to Vice Chairman of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region in 1986.

relationships.target: 广西壮族自治区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 成克杰于1986年起担任广西壮族自治区副主席，后升任代主席、主席。
description.en: Cheng Kejie served as Vice Chairman of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region starting in 1986, and was later promoted to Acting Chairman and then Chairman.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 成克杰接替韦纯束担任广西壮族自治区人民政府主席职务。
description.en: Cheng Kejie succeeded Wei Chunshu as the Chairman of the People's Government of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 李兆焯接替成克杰担任广西壮族自治区人民政府主席职务。
description.en: Li Zhaozhuo succeeded Cheng Kejie as the Chairman of the People's Government of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会

relationships.source: 第九届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 在第九届全国人大第一次会议上，成克杰当选为全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长。
description.en: At the first session of the 9th National People's Congress, Cheng Kejie was elected Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 成克杰担任全国人大常委会副委员长期间，李鹏是委员长。
description.en: While Cheng Kejie served as Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, Li Peng was the Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 成克杰自1998年当选全国人大常委会副委员长起，成为党和国家领导人，直至2000年被撤职。
description.en: Cheng Kejie became a Party and state leader after being elected Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress in March 1998, a position he held until his removal in April 2000.

description.zh-cn: 李平是成克杰的情妇，并伙同其收受贿赂款物合计人民币4109万余元。
description.en: Li Ping was Cheng Kejie's mistress and colluded with him to accept bribes totaling more than 41.09 million RMB.

description.zh-cn: 俞芳林在羁押期间向办案人员反映成克杰的腐败问题，直接导致了对成克杰的调查。
description.en: During his detention, Yu Fanglin reported Cheng Kejie's corruption issues to investigators, which directly led to the investigation against Cheng.

relationships.source: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据线索对成克杰的腐败问题进行调查。
description.en: Investigated Cheng Kejie for corruption based on leads.

relationships.source: 广西壮族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 罢免成克杰的全国人大代表职务。
description.en: Removed Cheng Kejie from his position as a deputy to the National People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 撤销成克杰的全国人大常委会副委员长职务。
description.en: Revoked Cheng Kejie's position as Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院

description.zh-cn: 决定依法逮捕成克杰。
description.en: Decided to arrest Cheng Kejie in accordance with the law.

relationships.source: 北京市第一中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 以受贿罪一审判处成克杰死刑。
description.en: Sentenced Cheng Kejie to death for bribery in the first instance trial.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

description.zh-cn: 裁定核准成克杰死刑，并于9月14日执行。
description.en: Approved the death sentence for Cheng Kejie, which was carried out on September 14.
